unnormalised: Arre yaar, Mumbai-nt property-che bhav bhangar aasat! Mhaka Andheri-nt ek 1BHK ₹1.5 Cr-ak dislem! Ani sq ft rate ₹25,000 asa mhunn somza. Mhozo broker mhanto ki te udya vorosan 10% vaddtele. Konn tori koso ghar gheunk sakta azakal? Down payment-ui 20 lakhs asun asa!
normalised: Arre yaar, Mumbai-ntle property-che daam khupuch uchch asa! Hanv Andheri-nt ek one B-H-K dedd crore rupayak dekhlem! Ani square feet-cho rate sumar ponchis hazar rupaya asa. Mhojea broker-an sangllem ki to udent vorsak dha percent-an vaddunk xakta. Aaj-kal konnak koxem ghor gheunk xakta? Down payment-ui sumar vis lakh asa!
text: Arre yaar, Mumbai-nt property-che bhav bhangar aasat! Mhaka Andheri-nt ek 1BHK ₹1.5 Cr-ak dislem! Ani sq ft rate ₹25,000 asa mhunn somza. Mhozo broker mhanto ki te udya vorosan 10% vaddtele. Konn tori koso ghar gheunk sakta azakal? Down payment-ui 20 lakhs asun asa!
